original: Ime kho panāyasmanto satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā uddesaṁ āgacchanti.
analyzed: ime kho pana āyasmanto satta adhikaraṇa samathāḥ dhammāḥ uddesam āgacchanti

original: Uddiṭṭhā kho, āyasmanto, satta adhikaraṇasamathā dhammā.
analyzed: uddiṭṭhā kho āyasmanto satta adhikaraṇa samathāḥ dhammā
parisuddhā itthā ayasmantaḥ tasmai tuṇhī evam etam dhārayāmi iti

original: Ettakaṁ tassa bhagavato suttāgataṁ suttapariyāpannaṁ anvaddhamāsaṁ uddesaṁ āgacchati.
analyzed: ettakam tassa bhagavato sutta āgatam sutta pariyāpannam anvaddha māsam uddesam āgacchati

original: Tattha sabbeheva samaggehi sammodamānehi avivadamānehi sikkhitabbanti.
analyzed: tattha sabbehi iva samaggehi sammodamānehi a vivadamānehi sikkhitabbanti
